languages.text: "Я говорил тебе, что ничего не дается бесплатно, Изгой. Своей душой ты прикрыла мон-кай от смерти, и подставилась под удар предков". {n}Шайрэнкхей печально качает головой.{/n} "По крайней мере, тебе удалось пережить ритуал. Скажи, были ли твои слова услышаны?"

"I told you that everything comes with a price, Outcast. You have shielded mon-keigh from danger with your soul and ended up coming under the attack of our ancestors." {n}Shairenkhei sorrowfully shakes his head.{/n} "At least you survived the rite. Tell me — were your words heard?"
languages.original_text: "Я говорил тебе, что ничего не дается бесплатно, Изгой. Своей душой ты прикрыла мон-кай от смерти, и подставилась под удар предков". {n}Шайрэнкхей печально качает головой.{/n} "По крайней мере, тебе удалось пережить ритуал. Скажи, были ли твои слова услышаны?"

traits.locale_text: "I told you that nothing comes without a price, Outcast. You have shielded mon-keigh from danger with your soul and ended up coming under attack of our ancestors." {n}Shirenkhei lamentably shakes his head.{/n} "At least you survived the ritual. Tell me — have your words been heard?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “流浪者，我曾告诉过你，凡事都有代价。你用你的灵魂保护了猴子的性命，却遭到了先祖的攻击。”{n}榭伦凯悲哀地摇了摇头。{/n}“但至少你在仪式中活了下来，告诉我——他们听到你的话了吗？”
languages.original_text: "I told you that everything comes with a price, Outcast. You have shielded mon-keigh from danger with your soul and ended up coming under the attack of our ancestors." {n}Shairenkhei sorrowfully shakes his head.{/n} "At least you survived the rite. Tell me — were your words heard?"

traits.locale_text: “流浪者，我曾告诉过你，凡事都有代价。你用你的灵魂保护了猴子的性命，却遭到了先祖的攻击。”{n}榭伦凯悲哀地摇了摇头。{/n}“但至少你在仪式中活了下来，告诉我——他们听到你的话了吗？”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Te dije que todo tendría un precio, proscrita. Has protegido {mf|al|a la} mon-keigh del peligro con tu propia alma y has recibido tú el ataque de nuestros ancestros». {n}Shairenkhei menea la cabeza apesadumbrado.{/n} «Por lo menos has sobrevivido al ritual. Dime, ¿escucharon tus palabras?».
languages.original_text: "I told you that everything comes with a price, Outcast. You have shielded mon-keigh from danger with your soul and ended up coming under the attack of our ancestors." {n}Shairenkhei sorrowfully shakes his head.{/n} "At least you survived the rite. Tell me — were your words heard?"

traits.locale_text: «Te dije que todo tendría un precio, proscrita. Has protegido {mf|al|a la} mon-keigh del peligro con tu propia alma y has recibido tú el ataque de nuestros ancestros». {n}Shirenkhei menea la cabeza apesadumbrado.{/n} «Por lo menos has sobrevivido al ritual. Dime, ¿escucharon tus palabras?».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Je vous avais bien dit que tout avait un prix, Errante. Vous avez employé votre âme pour protéger {mf|le|la} mon-keigh, et vous avez donc subi une attaque de nos ancêtres, {n}dit-il en secouant la tête tristement.{/n} Au moins, vous avez survécu au rite. Dites-moi, vous ont-ils entendue ? »
languages.original_text: "I told you that everything comes with a price, Outcast. You have shielded mon-keigh from danger with your soul and ended up coming under the attack of our ancestors." {n}Shairenkhei sorrowfully shakes his head.{/n} "At least you survived the rite. Tell me — were your words heard?"

traits.locale_text: « Je vous avais bien dit que tout avait un prix, Errante. Vous avez employé votre âme pour protéger {mf|le|la} mon-keigh, et vous avez donc subi une attaque de nos ancêtres, {n}dit-il en secouant la tête tristement.{/n} Au moins, vous avez survécu au rite. Dites-moi, vous ont-ils entendue ? »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ich habe Euch gesagt, dass alles einen Preis hat, Ausgestoßene. Ihr habt {mf|den|die} Chem-Pan-Sey mit Eurer Seele vor Gefahr abgeschirmt und wurdet darum von unseren Ahnen angegriffen." {n}Shairenkhei senkt bekümmert den Kopf.{/n} "Wenigstens habt Ihr das Ritual überlebt. Sagt mir: Wurden Eure Worte gehört?"
languages.original_text: "I told you that everything comes with a price, Outcast. You have shielded mon-keigh from danger with your soul and ended up coming under the attack of our ancestors." {n}Shairenkhei sorrowfully shakes his head.{/n} "At least you survived the rite. Tell me — were your words heard?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe Euch gesagt, dass alles einen Preis hat, Ausgestoßene. Ihr habt {mf|den|die} Chem-Pan-Sey mit Eurer Seele vor Gefahr abgeschirmt und wurdet darum von unseren Ahnen angegriffen. {n}Shirenkhei senkt bekümmert den Kopf.{/n} "Wenigstens habt Ihr das Ritual überlebt. Sagt mir: Wurden Eure Worte gehört?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「何事にも代償はつきものだと言ったはずだ、追放者よ。お前は魂でモン＝ケイを危険から守り、我々の父祖の攻撃を受けることになった」{n}シャイレンケイは悲しげに首を振る。{/n}「少なくともお前は儀式を生き延びた。教えてくれ、お前の言葉は聞き届られたのか？」
languages.original_text: "I told you that everything comes with a price, Outcast. You have shielded mon-keigh from danger with your soul and ended up coming under the attack of our ancestors." {n}Shairenkhei sorrowfully shakes his head.{/n} "At least you survived the rite. Tell me — were your words heard?"

traits.locale_text: 「何事にも代償はつきものだと言ったはずだ、追放者よ。お前は魂でモン＝ケイを危険から守り、我々の父祖の攻撃を受けることになった」{n}シャイレンケイは悲しげに首を振る。{/n}「少なくともお前は儀式を生き延びた。教えてくれ、お前の言葉は聞き届られたのか？」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Her şeyin bir bedeli olduğunu sana söylemiştim Yurtsuz. Ruhunu siper edip mon-keigh'i korudun ve atalarımızın saldırısına maruz kaldın." {n}Shairenkhei, kederle başını sallıyor.{/n} "En azından ayinden sağ çıkmayı başardın. Sözlerini duyan oldu mu?"
languages.original_text: "I told you that everything comes with a price, Outcast. You have shielded mon-keigh from danger with your soul and ended up coming under the attack of our ancestors." {n}Shairenkhei sorrowfully shakes his head.{/n} "At least you survived the rite. Tell me — were your words heard?"

traits.locale_text: "Her şeyin bir bedeli olduğunu sana söylemiştim Yurtsuz. Mon-keigh'yi ruhunla tehlikeden korudun ve atalarımızın saldırısına tutuldun." {n}Shairenkhei, kederle başını sallıyor.{/n} "En azından ayinden sağ çıkmayı başardın. Sözlerini duyan oldu mu?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
